titles.title: Technical Workers Fairness Act of 2003
To restore the standards used for determining whether technical workers are not employees as in effect before the Tax Reform Act of 1986.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/27/2003--Introduced. Technical Workers Fairness Act of 2003 - Amends the Revenue Act of 1978, as amended by the Tax Reform Act of 1986, to repeal the prohibition on treating certain technical service providers as independent contractors.
